Good morning and welcome to Best of 9to5Toys Weekly – a one-stop shop for all of the week’s best deals on Apple gear, Samsung and Android tech, accessories for smartphones and Macs, intelligent household upgrades, and even deals to update your wardrobe. The all-new Best of 9to5Toys collects all of the most notable deals and organizes them neatly into one handy catalog for you to peruse every Saturday morning.

more…

items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation weekly: Fresh lows on Odyssey gaming monitors, SteamOS Legion Go handheld nearly $200 off, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. It’s been a packed week for deals, with everything from Lenovo’s Legion Go S handheld seeing its first big discount since the Black Friday offer, to multiple Samsung and Acer gaming monitors seeing their best prices yet. We also spotted big drops on Razer keyboards and headsets, Copilot+ laptops from HP and Lenovo, and a stack of Anker chargers, docks, and accessories. A lot of them are still live and waiting for you below, so be sure to check them out in this week’s Battlestation Weekly.

more…

items.title: Anker weekend charging gear sale: Nano Smart Display, power banks, travel adapters, more from $20
items.summary:
This weekend we are tracking a number of notable deals on Anker charging solutions. Including everything from deep discounts on previous generation Prime gear like the originally $110 Prime Power Station with smart display now down at $60 shipped to its 5-port travel adapter that keeps you juiced up in “over 200 countries” down at $20 and its brand new Smart Display Nano Charger on sale for $30, there’s a versatile collection of options marked down right now. Scope it all out below.

more…

items.title: Electrified Weekly – rare price cuts on all Lectric e-bikes, exclusive VMAX e-scooter savings, Anker SOLIX winter sale ends soon, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. This week, we’ve got a few notable chances at some solid savings, with Lectric launching a weekend price cut flash sale taking $100 off all e-bikes starting from $799 lows, as well as $450 exclusive savings on three VMAX electric scooters that start from $749. We also have the soon-to-end Anker SOLIX Winter Sale with up to 65% discounts on power stations that start from $150, as well as a parallel 72-hour weekend flash sale from the brand that has given us some notable new and returning low prices starting from $429. We’ve got all that and more waiting for you below.

more…

items.title: Anker’s Smart Display Nano Charger now available on Amazon down at $30 Prime shipped
items.summary:
Anker unleashed its Smart Display Nano Charger at CES 2026 this year, and just after getting a chance to serve up some of my personal thoughts, it has now appeared on the brand’s official Amazon storefront with the same launch deal we were tracking previously. You can now land this mini charger with the animated display down at $29.99 Prime shipped. 

more…

items.title: 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – Baseus tire inflator, Anker pop-up power strip, tomtoc travel backpack, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – your go-to spot for already-affordable everyday essentials that are now selling for even less. This weekly roundup pulls together all of the Steals from the past week, and puts them in a digestable list for you to consume every Saturday morning. Leading the pack we’ve got Anker’s 8-in-1 pop-up USB-C power strip for $20, this tomtoc 40L travel backpack at $69.50, and also Baseus’ portable tire inflator for $20. You can find many more Steals down below.

items.summary:

There are several Trail, Alpine, and Ocean bands still on sale from earlier this week but now at lower prices alongside few new Amazon all-time lows that have now been added to the list like these Black and Blue/Bright Blue Trail Loop models, as well as the Anchor Blue Ocean Band.

items.title: Pre-orders now live: Super Mario Bros. Wonder Switch 2 Edition +  new amiibo
items.summary:
Update 1/24: Pre-orders are now live at Amazon for the new Super Mario Bros. Wonder amiibo right here, and the Super Mario Bros. Wonder Switch 2 Edition game. 

Alongside the new overview trailer for Nintendo’s adorable Talking Flower collectible from Super Mario Bros. Wonder, we are also getting some details on the actual game itself. We already knew the Switch 2 edition and an expansion were on the way this spring, but Nintendo has debuted a new trailer and announced the official release date alongside some special edition amiibo too.

While we did catch some notable price drops on Apple’s latest M5-powered iPad Pro lineup over Black Friday and the holidays last year, many of the deepest offers landed on the (more) niche high-end configurations. Today, however, Amazon is serving up some of its best prices ever on the most affordable 13-inch models at nearly $150 off.

items.title: Anker SOLIX winter weekend flash sale drops expanded C1000 gen 1 power station + bag to $729 low, more from $429
items.summary:
As part of its soon-to-end Winter Sale, Anker SOLIX has also launched a 72-hour weekend flash sale that will close out its current savings event, with some notable lows sticking around from the previous flash sale on the F2600 2,560Wh power station and its larger F3800 3,840Wh counterpart. Starting on the lower end of the pricing, you can currently find Anker’s SOLIX C1000 Gen 1 Portable Power Station bundled with an expansion battery and a water-resistant bag for $729 shipped, which beats out its bagless option at Amazon by $141. This package would fetch you $1,898 without any discounts, and hasn’t been featured like this in past sales, instead being split into two separate bundles. Considering the expanded setup has gone as low as $699, and the water-resistant bag on its own has gone as low as $80 (meaning $779 total with their best pricing), this bundle with all three certainly seems to be the lowest price you could score them with, complete with $1,169 savings. There’s also the newer and more compact C1000 Gen 2 Power Station down at $429 shipped, and matching its Amazon pricing. Head below for the full lineup.

more…

items.title: Lectric offers extremely rare price cuts on all e-bikes with some bundled FREE gear for few days – starting from $799 lows
items.summary:
Lectric has launched an unexpected weekend price cut flash sale that is striking $100 off most of its e-bikes, except the premium ONE e-bike with a $500 price cut, as well as some smaller bundle packages up to $220 in size across some series. Things are starting the lowest with the XP Lite2 JW Black Belt-Drive e-bike at $799 shipped, while you’ll have to go with its long-range chain-drive or belt-drive counterparts to also snag some FREE bundled gear. This standard model hardly ever comes with additional FREE gear like the longer-range models, but that lack of extra equipment is offset by the extremely rare $100 discount here that is a first in over a year, marking a new low price as far as we have tracked. Head below to learn more about it, its long-range upgrades, and to browse the full lineup of deals while they last over the next few days.

more…
